properties.Land_Slide: Landsliding - Alugolla
properties.Proposed_M: Follow the recommendations of NBRO

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Landsliding, Sinking - Thiriwanaketiya paddy field
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of 50 m long 300 mm x 300 mm (width x height) Rectangular Con. canal. Wall thickness 125 mm. Construction of 15 m long 2.2 m high concrete side wall on the downstream side of the canal.

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Soil sloughing and erosion of the road - Samagi mawatha of Maneluwa GND and all other roads
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of concrete side wall about 40 m long and 2 m high

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Sinking the bridge - The road from Delgasthenna to Waradiwela
properties.Proposed_M: A huge amount of money is needed to build this new bridge. Development proposals have been submitted to allocate funds from other projects. It is not appropriate to propose to allocate funds for this through this project.

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Erosion of the road - The road to Alupotha Getagahawela
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of a 50 m long, 3 m high side wall

properties.Land_Slide: 3. Slope Land collapse on the road - Main road of Putuhapuwa Werapitiya
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of new side wall 18 m long and 3 m high to extend the existing side wall.

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Landsliding - Galkanda Middle Division
properties.Proposed_M: It is best to take appropriate action based on the NBRO's advice.

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Slope Land collapse on the road - Galkanda Middle Division
properties.Proposed_M: Removing the soil that has fallen onto the road and constructing a 40 m long and 3 m high side wall.

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Landslide - Near the Cemetery
properties.Proposed_M: Follow NBRO recommendations

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Flooding - Culvert near the Priyadarshana's house
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of a 20 m long, 3 m high concrete side wall

properties.Land_Slide: 3. Flooding - Near the Danaraja's House
properties.Proposed_M: Villagers propose construction of a drainage system with a road leading from the top of mountain to the slope. It is not possible to construct under this project as it would be very expensive.

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Landsliding - Near the K.M. Kulasekara's house
properties.Proposed_M: Follow NBRO recommendations

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Landsliding - Near the Mr. Wilson's house
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of a 10 m long, 3 m high concrete side wall

properties.Land_Slide: 3. Landsliding - Near the Mr. Punchi Banda's house
properties.Proposed_M: Follow NBRO recommendations

properties.Land_Slide: 4. Collapsing boulders - Near the Mr. Ajith's house
properties.Proposed_M: Follow NBRO recommendations

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Landsliding - Near the cemetry of 'Akkra 80'
properties.Proposed_M: Follow NBRO recommendations

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Risk of landsliding - 'Akkra 80'
properties.Proposed_M: This problem can be solved by activating the old water streams after proper study. This should be accomplished by local council that is responsible for the construction the road.

properties.Land_Slide: Landsliding, Bank collapsing at rainy season - Nugepathana village
properties.Proposed_M: Follow NBRO recommendations

properties.Land_Slide: Land embankments collapse - Kumbaloluwa - Ihalagama
properties.Proposed_M: Applications of soil conservation practices and also the people should be placed in another suitable land

properties.Land_Slide: 1. Slope Land collapse on the road - Himali Abesekara home near the road
properties.Proposed_M: Cutting the bank to increase the slope and planting vetiver grass.

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Slope Land collapse on the road - E.M shanthe menike home near the Siridigana road
properties.Proposed_M: Cutting the bank to increase the slope and planting vetiver grass.

properties.Land_Slide: 3. Water flow in to the road - Muthumenike pemawathe  home near the road
properties.Proposed_M: The 6.2 m long concrete  head wall of the pipe culvert should be raised by 600 mm.

properties.Land_Slide: Landslide - North Balagahathenn
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of stone terraces, Live fence etc.
